attributes.action: SCRAP the TOLL CHARGES completely on the Dartford River Crossing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: SCRAPPING the toll charges on the Dartford River Crossing completely, would remove the CONGESTION altogether. Providing a JAM FREE M25. Similar scrappings on TOLL charging have proved very successful in SCOTLAND

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
